title: Automation Templates Marketplace
description: Package Joe's automation consulting knowledge into reusable templates and workflows sold as digital products. Could include: LaunchAgent templates, cron job configurations, data transformation scripts, Slack bot setups, monitoring dashboards. Low effort per unit ($10-50 each), infinite scalability. Use Gumroad or Lemon Squeezy for distribution. Each consulting engagement could generate a template as a byproduct.

title: Even Us Up: B2B Expense Splitting for Small Teams
description: Pivot Even Us Up from consumer expense sharing to also target small businesses — co-working spaces, consulting teams, shared offices, roommate houses with shared utilities. Premium features: receipt OCR scanning, tax categorization, QuickBooks/Wave integration, recurring splits, PDF export for accountants. B2B customers pay more and churn less than consumer users.
revenueModel: Freemium: free for personal, $4.99/mo per team for business features

title: Personal AI OS Platform (Alfred-as-a-Service)
description: Joe is building a sophisticated personal AI operating system (OpenClaw + Command Center + cron + notifications + multi-channel). This stack could be productized for other solopreneurs, consultants, and small business owners who want their own 'Alfred'. Sell the pickaxes during the gold rush. Could start as a self-hosted open-source project with paid managed hosting, or a SaaS with customizable AI agent templates.
revenueModel: SaaS ($29-99/mo) or managed hosting ($49-199/mo per instance)

title: Proactive Passive Income Opportunity Detector
description: AI agent that continuously scans market gaps, new platforms, trends in Joe's expertise areas (automation, trading, SaaS) and proactively suggests ideas with market size + effort estimates.

title: Client Automation Ideas Pipeline
description: Extract automation pain points from consulting engagements and turn them into product ideas or consulting upsells. Build a structured pipeline: observation → research → prototype → pitch.

title: Project Health Command Center
description: Dashboard that aggregates project metrics across CoinUsUp, Even Us Up, Signal App, and consulting work. One-glance view of revenue, users, churn, feature velocity, blockers, and team health.

title: Smart Code Review Bot
description: AI agent that reviews PRs, suggests refactors, catches security issues, and explains trade-offs. Reduces code review friction and accelerates shipping velocity.

title: Multi-Device Work Sync & Context Bridge
description: Seamless context switching between Mac mini (OpenClaw), Mac laptop, and Windows gaming laptop. Unified inbox, focus state, and project context across all devices.

title: Weekly Wins & Impact Digest
description: Auto-generated weekly summary of what shipped, metrics moved, revenue/growth impact, blockers resolved, and new learnings. Builds narrative of progress for stakeholders + personal motivation.

title: Communication DNA Dashboard
description: Visual map of how Joe prefers to communicate (async vs sync, channels, response time, decision-making style). Helps Alfred + team optimize for Joe's communication patterns.

title: Cost-Per-Project P&L
description: Automatic cost tracking across projects (dev time, API spend, hosting, tools). Real-time unit economics for each app: revenue per hour, CAC, LTV, burn rate.

title: Surprise & Delight Engine
description: Random small wins: push notification when a user hits a milestone, celebrate revenue goals with Slack messages, send motivational insights on slow days. Keeps morale up.

title: Your Next Idea Generator
description: AI agent that analyzes Joe's past ideas, successes, patterns, market trends, and generates 3 personalized product ideas every month with execution outlines.

title: Smart Model Router 2.0
description: Evolved version of current routing logic: dynamically choose LOCAL/Codex/Haiku/Sonnet/Opus based on task complexity, token budget, latency requirements, and cost constraints.

title: Consulting Rate Optimizer
description: Tool that analyzes Joe's consulting project profitability, skill gaps, client quality, and recommends rate increases or project passes. Maximizes income per hour.

title: AI Cost Optimization Service
description: Joe just optimized his cron costs from $188/mo to $0.22/mo. Package this expertise into a service: outsourced AI cost audits for app builders and AI teams. 30-min audit uncovers waste, recommend model/routing changes, provide monitoring templates. Follow-up: ongoing optimization ($99/mo). Direct monetization of his infrastructure and cost-optimization knowledge.

title: Independent Consultant Toolkit SaaS
description: Joe has 20 years of consulting and legal billing background. Package the playbook into a SaaS for 1099 consultants: rate optimization, project profitability tracking, client quality scoring, billing templates, retainer models, trust accounting basics, contract templates. Target freelance developers, consultants, agencies. Premium tier: automated invoicing + financial dashboards + client communication templates.
revenueModel: Freemium: free basic, $19/mo (templates + tracking), $49/mo premium (automation + dashboards)

title: Vibe Coding Course + Advanced Toolkit
description: Joe's approach to building (pragmatic, AI-first, 'vibe coding' via Claude Code + Ollama) is a unique differentiator. Create a paid course + community teaching consultants and developers how to ship faster with Claude Code + local models. Include: workflow templates, model routing patterns, cost-budgeting, cron automation examples, LaunchAgent setups. Use CoinUsUp/Job Tracker/Command Center as reference implementations. Recurring revenue via monthly advanced template releases + group coaching calls.
revenueModel: Course ($299 one-time), advanced tier ($99/mo for new templates + coaching), enterprise licenses
